Smash Karts is a fast-paced and chaotic kart racing game that combines speed, strategy, and explosive weaponry. Join the race, outsmart opponents, and use an array of power-ups to secure victory. Whether youâ€™re dodging missiles, deploying traps, or speeding through the track, Smash Karts delivers an adrenaline-fueled multiplayer experience.

Game Controls
Master the controls to navigate the chaos and dominate the track:

Arrow Keys or WASD: Control the movement of your kart.
Spacebar: Use power-ups to gain an advantage.
Mouse: Aim and shoot power-ups at opponents.
How to Play
Select Your Kart: Choose your preferred kart, each with unique attributes.
Enter the Race: Join a multiplayer race and compete against other players.
Collect Power-ups: Grab power-ups scattered on the track for offensive and defensive advantages.
Outrace and Outsmart: Use speed and cunning to outmaneuver opponents, avoid obstacles, and be the last kart standing.
